content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”#f7f7f7 0%|#ffffff 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#f7f7f7″ background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_4_text_color=”#86754E” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Contact Us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Frequently Asked Questions

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” module_alignment=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”Address Change” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Please send our Client Servicing team an email at info@RosenGroup.ca providing your name, your new address and the effective date of the change.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Make a Contribution or Deposit” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Deposits can be made by online bill payment with your local financial institution. You must set up the payee as Raymond James LTD,  the Raymond James account number would be the full account number for the specific account where you would like to deposit the funds. As well, please send our Client Servicing team an email at info@RosenGroup.ca to advise us of the incoming deposit.

Otherwise, you can make a cheque payable to Raymond James Ltd, indicate the account number where you would like the funds deposited, and mail the cheque to either our Pointe-Claire office or Yorkville office.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Apply for Online Access” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

CLICK HERE

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Online Access – Forgot Password” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Log on to www.rjcs.raymondjames.ca and click on the left hand side, middle, Forgot Password.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Refer a Friend, Colleague or Family Member” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We thank you in advance for your trust and confidence by considering to refer your valued contact with us. We will endeavor to provide the same high level of service to your referral as you enjoy. Please contact Rosie LeBlanc at 514-951-0886 (cell) or 514-782-6004 (office) or by email at Rosie.LeBlanc@RosenGroup.ca.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”RRSP Contribution Room” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

To find out the amount of registered retirement savings plan (RRSP) contributions you can deduct on your current-year return—and if it applies, any unused contributions available for you to claim, by phoning the CRA Tax Information phone service at 1-800-267-6999 or online at https://www.canada.ca/en/revenue-agency.html

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”TFSA Contribution Room” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Knowing how much contribution room you have available in your tax-free savings account (TFSA) will help you take maximum advantage of tax-sheltered growth potential, and also help you avoid over-contribution penalties. If you have multiple TFSAs, your combined contributions off all of them cannot exceed your available contribution room. You can find out your TFSA balance for the current year by phoning the CRA Tax Information phone service at 1-800-267-6999 or online at https://www.canada.ca/en/revenue-agency.html

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Client support is available Monday through Friday from 9:00 am to 4:00 pm Eastern Standard Time. Please call toll-free: 1-877-322-7282, or in Montreal 514-782-5966 and in Toronto 416-777-7176, or by email: info@RosenGroup.ca

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
